name: Love Bangle
description:
With this bangle you can share a piece of "love" anywhere you go!

It is made with 14 Gauge wire and is very durable. The bangle is pounded for texture that adds strength and then polished for beautiful shine. Wear it everyday and see what kind of compliments you get!! =)

The "o" is a regular pearl which is included. If you wanted a Tahitian pearl there is an additional cost so make sure you add the "8mm-9mm Tahitian Pearl" option in the drop down menu and I'll know that you want the Tahitian Pearl. 

Please refer to the link below (Measurements) on how to properly measure your hand.

*Please allow each piece to be made in about 2 weeks as quality takes time.*

*If you wanted to add anything extra to your bangle please contact me, otherwise there are a few additional options in the drop down menu. Just add it to the cart*

*Please make sure you measure your hand correctly, if you need a smaller/bigger size; please contact me"

options.name: Open Heart - in Rose Gold Filled

name: Tahitian Pearl Bangles
description:
Ever wanted to take a piece of the sea with you everywhere you go?!? Well now you can with these beautiful Tahitian Pearl bangles and you can layer them with anything. This piece is the most versatile and can be worn with any outfit! Now that's my kind of jewelry!

It is made with 12 Gauge (thicker than 14 Gauge) wire and is very durable. The bangle is pounded for texture that adds strength and then polished for beautiful shine. This includes one 12-13mm Tahitian Pearl in either Round or Circle/Baroque. If not specified, I will randomly select one of these beauties for you. Wear it everyday and see what kind of compliments you get!! =)

Please refer to the link below (Measurements) on how to properly measure your hand.

*Please allow each piece to be made in about 2 weeks as quality takes time.*

*If you want to add another shell, an open heart, a charm or wanted more Tahitian pearls added on to it, please contact me*

*Please make sure you measure your hand correctly, if you need a smaller/bigger size; please contact me"

name: Word Silk Wraps
description:
Each ribbon is hand-dyed and gives each color a unique look. It's texture and look is just plain beautiful. "love" and "aloha" are both available. If you want to customize a name/word go ahead and contact me.

FIESTA colors - are the bright bold colors pictured

TWIGHLIGHT - are the more neutral softer colors pictured.

The word is bent in either sterling silver or gold-filled. It comes with 2 colors and both ribbons are folded to be about 20' each. It used to wrap around your wrist to stack, or you can wear it as a choker or necklace. It's a versatile piece! =)

name: Tahitian "Love" Necklace
description:
Tahitian pearls are like diamonds to island girls, so this piece is very special. In mind that I absolutely love pearls, I wanted to make a simple necklace that I could wear everyday. Layer it with other necklaces and wear it for casual/dressed up days.

Comes with (5) 10-12mm Tahitian pearls, with wire bent into the word "love" on a sterling silver, gold-filled, or rose gold-filled 36" necklace.

*Please allow each piece to be made in about 1-2 weeks as quality takes time.*

name: Pukana Lā Handchain
description:
Sunrise shells are good as Gold here in Hawaii and according to "legend" they were very sacred to the ancient Hawaiians. The story goes: "Servants of the kings would walk the beaches and look for these shells, but only the Royal Family would wear these magnificent shells. They received the name "sunrise" because early in the morning (at sunrise) the Sunrise shell would be the easiest shells to spot on the beach. The sun would reflect its rays of the vibrant colors of these beautiful scallop shells." So do you feel like royalty?!? This piece will definitely make you feel that way!!

Comes with one sunrise shell and (2) 8mm Tahitian Pearls on either gold-filled or rose gold-filled.

*Please allow each piece to be made in about 1-2 weeks as quality takes time.*

*Please know that each shell/pearl have different color variations. So if there is a certain color that you're looking for, please contact me*

name: Pule Pukana Lā Necklace
description:
Sunrise shells are good as Gold here in Hawaii and according to "legend" they were very sacred to the ancient Hawaiians. The story goes: "Servants of the kings would walk the beaches and look for these shells, but only the Royal Family would wear these magnificent shells. They received the name "sunrise" because early in the morning (at sunrise) the Sunrise shell would be the easiest shells to spot on the beach. The sun would reflect its rays of the vibrant colors of these beautiful scallop shells." So do you feel like royalty?!? This piece will definitely make you feel that way!!

This piece was inspired by the rosary prayer bead necklaces. It comes with one sunrise shell and each link is made from the gemstone jasper, on either gold-filled or rose gold-filled. *Can also be made on sterling silver upon request.*

*Please allow each piece to be made in about 1-2 weeks as quality takes time.*

*Please know that each shell/pearl have different color variations. So if there is a certain color that you're looking for, please contact me*

name: Gold-Dipped Necklaces
description:
Living in Hawaii, we are blessed to have golden sunrises and sunsets almost everyday. So this collections is inspired by the beautiful scenery of Hawaii's beaches. Collecting from the ocean, I gather beautiful shells and sea glass that are then dipped in Gold. Add this piece to spice up your golden style!! =)

Each Pendant is Gold-Dipped in 24kt gold and then is put on a  gold-filled chain that is adjustable at 16" and 18". Necklace comes with one pendant.

*Please allow each piece to be made in about 1-2 weeks as quality takes time.*

description:
Living in Hawaii, we are blessed to have golden sunrises and sunsets almost everyday. So this collections is inspired by the beautiful scenery of Hawaii's beaches. Comes with one charm that is Gold-Dipped in 24kt gold and then is put on a 12 Gauge Gold-Filled Bangle. The bangle is pounded for texture that adds strength and then polished for beautiful shine. Wear it everyday and see what kind of compliments you get!!
